name: jira-prepare-commit-msg-mattfork
description: Husky Git hook to add Jira ticket ID into the commit message

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.prepare:husky:2: cd ./test/integration/husky2 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky2 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:3: cd ./test/integration/husky3 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky3 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:4: cd ./test/integration/husky4 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky4 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:5: cd ./test/integration/husky5 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky5 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:6: cd ./test/integration/husky6 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky6 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:7: cd ./test/integration/husky7 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky7 && npm i
scripts.prepare:husky:8: cd ./test/integration/husky8 && git init && git checkout -b JIRA-4321-test-husky8 && npm i
scripts.cleanup:husky:2: cd ./test/integration/husky2 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup:husky:3: cd ./test/integration/husky3 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup:husky:4: cd ./test/integration/husky4 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanup:husky:5: cd ./test/integration/husky5 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf .husky
scripts.cleanup:husky:6: cd ./test/integration/husky6 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf .husky
scripts.cleanup:husky:7: cd ./test/integration/husky7 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf .husky
scripts.cleanup:husky:8: cd ./test/integration/husky8 && rimraf .git && rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf .husky
scripts.test:prepare: npm run prepare:husky:2 && npm run prepare:husky:3 && npm run prepare:husky:4 && npm run prepare:husky:5 && npm run prepare:husky:6 && npm run prepare:husky:7 && npm run prepare:husky:8
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test:full
scripts.test:full: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.posttest: npm run cleanup:husky:2 && npm run cleanup:husky:3 && npm run cleanup:husky:4 && npm run cleanup:husky:5 && npm run cleanup:husky:6  && npm run cleanup:husky:7  && npm run cleanup:husky:8
